text:
Unit tests do not pass for me in the current CVS trunk; AssertionsTest fails
(see attached log).

Apparently known problem - there is a thread "Junit assertions" on ant-dev that
seems to refer to this. Failure presumably triggered by stevel's recent changes
to the test (whatever the root cause may be).

If others get this test failure too, and a fix for the problem is not already
available, could this test be added to build.xml#teststhatfail temporarily to
avoid confusion for people who do not know about it?
creator: jglick@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 11284
Test failure log (JDK 1.4.2_04, Linux)

text:
This is becauase the test confirming bug 27218 is present in CVS but the bug
hasn't been fixed yet.
